SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

GM North America President Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to "deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand

He said Google's three-person leadership structure, which has existed for a decade, sometimes added "delay" in the company's decision-making. By elevating me and having Larry Page running things day-to-day we think this will improve, he said, adding that the three agreed to make the changes after "a long series of conversations."
